# project

cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(Elys LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(Elys "")
set_target_properties(Elys PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Elys")
set_target_properties(Elys PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")

    include
    libs/include
)

    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
)
target_compile_options(Elys PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(Elys PRIVATE /EHsc)
else()
    target_compile_options(Elys PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(Elys PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(Elys PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(Elys PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(Elys PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(Elys PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET Elys PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
